languages.text: Влияние Губительных сил осквернило док Мю-514, исковеркав его до неузнаваемости. Многие пути наступления были перерезаны стенами из плоти, сросшейся с металлом, и пространственными аномалиями. Сотни одержимых машин, собранных на Ефрате-II, ополчились против нас. Враг ждал нашей атаки, и надо было внести беспорядок в его оборону.

traits.locale_text: Разрушительное влияние Губительных Сил осквернило док Мю-514, исковеркав его строение до неузнаваемости. Многие пути наступления были отрезаны стенами из плоти, сросшейся с металлом, или пространственными аномалиями. По факту, наступление большими силами было возможно лишь через охраняемые бесчисленными турелями главные ворота дока.

languages.text: The influence of the Ruinous Powers had corrupted and twisted Dock Mu-514 beyond recognition. Many potential approaches were blocked by walls of flesh fused with metal and anomalies that bent reality around them. Hundreds of possessed machines assembled on Eufrates II rose against us. The enemy was expecting us to strike, and we needed to disrupt their defences before attacking.
languages.original_text: Влияние Губительных сил осквернило док Мю-514, исковеркав его до неузнаваемости. Враг ждал нашей атаки, и надо было внести беспорядок в его оборону.

The enemy was expecting us to strike, and we needed to disrupt their defences before attacking.

Many potential approaches were blocked by walls of flesh fused with metal and anomalies that bent reality around them. Hundreds of possessed machines assembled on Eufrates II rose against us. The enemy was expecting us to strike, and we needed to disrupt their defences before attacking.

languages.text: 毁灭之力的影响，已经让穆-514号船坞变得面目全非。许多原本可以通行的通道，如今都被金属与血肉融在一起构成的墙壁阻挡，异常的现象扭曲了真实世界的景象。几百台被恶灵附身的机器集结在欧夫拉茨二号星上，向我们发起进攻。敌人准备以逸待劳，击溃我们，而我们需要在进攻之前，先破坏他们的防御系统。
languages.original_text: The influence of the Ruinous Powers had corrupted and twisted Dock Mu-514 beyond recognition. Many potential approaches were blocked by walls of flesh fused with metal and anomalies that bent reality around them. Hundreds of possessed machines assembled on Eufrates II rose against us. The enemy was expecting us to strike, and we needed to disrupt their defences before attacking.

traits.locale_text: 毁灭之力的影响，已经让穆-514号船坞变得面目全非。许多原本可以通行的通道，如今都被金属与血肉融在一起构成的墙壁阻挡，异常的现象扭曲了现实世界的景象。几百台被恶灵附身的机器集结在欧夫拉茨二号星上，向我们发起进攻。敌人准备以逸待劳，击溃我们，而我们需要在进攻之前，先破坏他们的防御系统。

languages.text: Le quai Mu-514 était méconnaissable, corrompu et déformé par l'influence des Puissances de la Ruine. De nombreux accès potentiels étaient bloqués par des murs de chair et de métal fusionnés, ainsi que des anomalies déformant la réalité tout autour d'elles. Des centaines de machines, fabriquées sur Euphrate-II et désormais possédées, se sont retournées contre nous. L'ennemi s'attendait à notre attaque et nous devions perturber ses défenses avant de frapper.
languages.original_text: The influence of the Ruinous Powers had corrupted and twisted Dock Mu-514 beyond recognition. Many potential approaches were blocked by walls of flesh fused with metal and anomalies that bent reality around them. Hundreds of possessed machines assembled on Eufrates II rose against us. The enemy was expecting us to strike, and we needed to disrupt their defences before attacking.

traits.locale_text: Le quai Mu-514 était méconnaissable, corrompu et déformé par l'influence des Puissances de la Ruine. De nombreux accès potentiels étaient bloqués par des murs de chair et de métal fusionnés, ainsi que des anomalies déformant la réalité tout autour d'elles. Des centaines de machines, fabriquées sur Euphrate-II et désormais possédées, se sont retournées contre nous. L'ennemi s'attendait à notre attaque et nous devions perturber ses défenses avant de frapper.

languages.text: 禍つ神々の影響はドックMu-514を認識できないほど腐敗させ、歪ませていた。多くの潜在的な襲撃方法は金属と融合した肉の壁と、現実を捻じ曲げる異変によって阻まれた。ユーフラテス・IIに集結した何百台もの憑依された機械が我々に反旗を翻した。敵は我々の攻撃を予期しており、攻撃する前に奴らの防衛網を破壊する必要があった。
languages.original_text: The influence of the Ruinous Powers had corrupted and twisted Dock Mu-514 beyond recognition. Many potential approaches were blocked by walls of flesh fused with metal and anomalies that bent reality around them. Hundreds of possessed machines assembled on Eufrates II rose against us. The enemy was expecting us to strike, and we needed to disrupt their defences before attacking.

traits.locale_text: 禍つ神々の影響はドックMu-514を認識できないほど腐敗させ、歪ませていた。多くの潜在的な襲撃方法は金属と融合した肉の壁と、現実を捻じ曲げる異変によって阻まれた。ユーフラテス・IIに集結した何百台もの憑依された機械が我々に反旗を翻した。敵は我々の攻撃を予期しており、攻撃する前に奴らの防衛網を破壊する必要があった。

languages.text: La influencia de los Poderes Ruinosos había deformado el puerto Mu-514 más allá de toda comprensión. Muchas de las rutas estaban bloqueadas por paredes de carne fundida con metal y anomalías que distorsionaban la realidad a su alrededor. Cientos de máquinas poseídas ensambladas en Eufrates II se alzaron contra nosotros. El enemigo esperaba que atacáramos y tendríamos que debilitar sus defensas para ello.
languages.original_text: The influence of the Ruinous Powers had corrupted and twisted Dock Mu-514 beyond recognition. Many potential approaches were blocked by walls of flesh fused with metal and anomalies that bent reality around them. Hundreds of possessed machines assembled on Eufrates II rose against us. The enemy was expecting us to strike, and we needed to disrupt their defences before attacking.

traits.locale_text: La influencia de los Poderes Ruinosos había deformado el puerto Mu-514 más allá de toda comprensión. Muchas de las rutas estaban bloqueadas por paredes de carne fundida con metal y anomalías que distorsionaban la realidad a su alrededor. Cientos de máquinas poseídas ensambladas en Eufrates II se alzaron contra nosotros. El enemigo esperaba que atacáramos y tendríamos que debilitar sus defensas para ello.

languages.text: Der Einfluss der Mächte der Zerstörung hatte Dock Mu-514 bis zur Unkenntlichkeit korrumpiert und entstellt. Viele potenzielle Zugänge waren durch Wände aus Fleisch und Metall blockiert. Auch Anomalien, welche die Realität selbst verzerrten, befanden sich in diesen Wänden. Hunderte von besessenen Maschinen, die auf Eufrates II gebaut worden waren, erhoben sich gegen uns. Der Feind erwartete unseren Angriff, und wir mussten seine Verteidigung stören, ehe wir die Offensive starten konnten.
languages.original_text: The influence of the Ruinous Powers had corrupted and twisted Dock Mu-514 beyond recognition. Many potential approaches were blocked by walls of flesh fused with metal and anomalies that bent reality around them. Hundreds of possessed machines assembled on Eufrates II rose against us. The enemy was expecting us to strike, and we needed to disrupt their defences before attacking.

traits.locale_text: Der Einfluss der Mächte der Zerstörung hatte Dock Mu-514 bis zur Unkenntlichkeit korrumpiert und entstellt. Viele potenzielle Zugänge waren durch Wände aus Fleisch und Metall blockiert. Auch Anomalien, welche die Realität selbst verzerrten, befanden sich in diesen Wänden. Hunderte von besessenen Maschinen, die auf Eufrates II gebaut worden waren, erhoben sich gegen uns. Der Feind erwartete unseren Angriff, und wir mussten seine Verteidigung stören, ehe wir die Offensive starten konnten.

languages.text: Rıhtım Mu-514, Yıkıcı Güçler'in etkisiyle yozlaşmış ve çarpılmış, tanınmaz hâle gelmişti. Olası müdahale yöntemlerinin çoğu, metale ve etrafındaki gerçekliği büken anomalilere karışan etten duvarlarca engelleniyordu. Eufrates II'de toplanan yüzlerce ele geçirilmiş makine, bize karşı ayaklandı. Düşman saldırmamızı bekliyordu, bizimse saldırmadan evvel savunmalarını yıkmamız gerekiyordu.
languages.original_text: The influence of the Ruinous Powers had corrupted and twisted Dock Mu-514 beyond recognition. Many potential approaches were blocked by walls of flesh fused with metal and anomalies that bent reality around them. Hundreds of possessed machines assembled on Eufrates II rose against us. The enemy was expecting us to strike, and we needed to disrupt their defences before attacking.
